sentences.en: Acute appendicitis usually develops without relation to the ingestion of food.
sentences.cn: 急性阑尾炎的发生通常与饮食无关.

sentences.en: After appendicitis operation do the 4 th day return meeting bowel adhesion?
sentences.cn: 阑尾炎手术后第4天还会肠粘连 么 ?

sentences.en: Appendicitis is a kind of common illness in clinic.
sentences.cn: 阑尾炎是临床上一种常见病.

sentences.en: Do I have appendicitis?
sentences.cn: 我得的是阑尾炎吗？

sentences.en: He and Farkash met when he had appendicitis and she was a nurse, and they were married in 1970 or 1971 and have seven children.
sentences.cn: 卡扎菲与索菲亚的相识，是因为他得了阑尾炎，而那时，她是一名护士。 两人在1970或1971年结婚，膝下育有七名儿女。

sentences.en: He came down with appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 他得了阑尾炎.

sentences.en: He fell ill with acute appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 他得了急性阑尾炎.

sentences.en: He had his appendix removed last month because of appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 上个月他因患阑尾炎而切除了阑尾.

sentences.en: He is recovering in hospital after an operation for acute appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 做完急性阑尾炎手术后，他正在医院康复。

sentences.en: Her doctor made a diagnosis of appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 她的医生作出阑尾炎的诊断。

sentences.en: How does the operation record of appendicitis write ~!
sentences.cn: 阑尾炎的手术记录怎么写~!

sentences.en: Hung - chien was worried lest he get appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 只担心自己要生盲肠炎.

sentences.en: It's acute appendicitis. We ought to operate.
sentences.cn: 这是急性阑尾炎. 应当开刀.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate affect of wound infection rate in gangrenous appendicitis after appendectomy.
sentences.cn: 目的了解坏疽型阑尾炎术后放置腹腔引流对切口感染的影响.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and treatment of pregnancy with appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨妊娠合并阑尾炎的诊断和治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of ultrasound in acute appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨超声检查在急性阑尾炎诊断中的应用价值.

sentences.en: Recentaly, he had Appendicitis and went through a surgery.
sentences.cn: 前不久, 他得了急性阑尾炎,做了个手术.

sentences.en: The diagnosis is appendicitis, an ovarian cyst and an as yet unnamed bowel/colon condition.
sentences.cn: 诊断结果是阑尾炎，卵巢囊肿和尚不能确定的大肠或结肠问题。

sentences.en: The doctor has cured numerous people of appendicitis .
sentences.cn: 这个医生治愈了很多人的阑尾炎。

sentences.en: You'll be operated on for your appendicitis this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午给你的阑尾炎动手术.

trans.tran_en: an illness in which your  appendix  swells and causes pain
